name: nlcst-to-textom
description: Transform an NLCST node into a TextOM node
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test.js
scripts.lint: npm run-script lint-api && npm run-script lint-test && npm run-script lint-style
scripts.make: npm run-script lint && npm run-script coverage
